rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0001
rows.name:
Amazing.
You get a great view of the town from
here, eh.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0002
rows.name:
Told ya so. When the Zekenator says
there's a good view, he doesn't lie.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0003
rows.name:
Matter of fact, it's the best
view in all of Torigo.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0004
rows.name: You're not from here, are you, Zeke?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0005
rows.name:
You seem to know quite a lot about
the place.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0006
rows.name: Well, you see...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0007
rows.name:
Last time I was here, the old geez at
the inn gave me the lowdown.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh right, you used to travel
all over the place, didn't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0009
rows.name:
Do you know a lot about other
places apart from Gula, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh, yes. You wouldn't believe
some of the things I've seen.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0011
rows.name:
But listen, I want you to tell me
something. What does this scenery
right here make you think of?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0012
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0013
rows.name: It's such a big, lively town.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0014
rows.name: Honestly, I think I prefer Iyasaki.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0101
rows.name: Yeah. Hmmm. Sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0102
rows.name:
But, y'know... That's just a facade.
It's what they want you to see.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0103
rows.name: A facade?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0104
rows.name: Yeah, exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0105
rows.name:
Like, you know Gula's a
colony of Superbia right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0106
rows.name:
Well, the only reason the town looks
so lively is 'cos Superbia has
a military base here.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0107
rows.name:
Most other settlements in Gula,
everyone's doing hard work like
farming and lumberjacking.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0108
rows.name:
And most of what they produce, they
export to Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0109
rows.name:
It's quite a tough life here. A lot of
folks are struggling.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0111
rows.name: And it's not just Gula, either.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0112
rows.name:
I've seen a good few dark underbellies
on my travels, no doubt about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0113
rows.name:
Did you ever try to help those people
out?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0114
rows.name: Ah, so many times.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0115
rows.name:
I had it in my head that the Zekenator
had the power to fix anything.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0116
rows.name:
But...fancy sword skills and titles...
They aren't much use to most folks.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0117
rows.name:
I was trying to save the world alone.
But what happened is that reality bit
me on the arse.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0118
rows.name: Hey, don't look at it like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0119
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0120
rows.name:
Sure, maybe you don't have the power
to save the whole world right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0121
rows.name:
But there are definitely people
out there you have helped.
Me and Homura, for a start.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0122
rows.name: So Zeke, don't ever give up.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0123
rows.name:
Don't forget, you've got some people
you can count on now.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0124
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0125
rows.name:
You really are.
I dunno what I was thinking.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0126
rows.name:
It's not just the Zekenator now. I've got
you guys watching my back.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0127
rows.name:
Some of the things I couldn't do back
then might even be possible now.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0128
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0129
rows.name:
So let's keep doing what we can.
All of us, together.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0130
rows.name:
Yeah!
I just gotta put my back into it.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0131
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Look out, world! The Zekenator's
coming to rock your socks off!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0132
rows.name:
Whew! That sure felt good.
Your turn, Rex! Let your manifesto out!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0133
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0134
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'm gonna get Homura and Hikari to
Eden, or die trying!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0135
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Yeeehaaaa!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0136
rows.name: What are you two DOING?!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0137
rows.name: You're embarrassing me...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0201
rows.name:
Iyasaki's a peaceful village, right?
War hasn't really reached it?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0202
rows.name: Yeah. That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0203
rows.name:
Problem is, most villages in
Alst can't say the same.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0204
rows.name: What do you mean exactly?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0205
rows.name:
Listen up, chum. What you see on the
surface? That's not the whole story.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0206
rows.name:
A lot of places that look like they're
doing well have a lot of people
suffering in the shadows.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0207
rows.name: Even here in Gula?

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0208
rows.name:
Sure as. You can see Torigo doing
great, same as the other towns where
there's an Superbian army base.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0209
rows.name:
But most other settlements in Gula?
They scrape by on hard labor like
farming and lumberjacking.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0210
rows.name:
And most of what they produce, they
export to Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0211
rows.name:
It's quite a tough life here. A lot of
folks are struggling.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0212
rows.name: And it's not just Gula, either.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0213
rows.name:
I've seen a whole bunch of places like
this, and they make me realize how
powerless I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0215
rows.name: Zeke, you aren't powerless.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0216
rows.name: You never stop wanting to help people.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0217
rows.name:
Even now, you're thinking about the
people who really need your help.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0218
rows.name: Exactly how a future king should think.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0219
rows.name: Hey, don't take the piss.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0220
rows.name: I mean it.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0221
rows.name:
I'm all spent just worrying about
the people right in front of me.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0222
rows.name: Homura, Hikari, Nia, Gramps...

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0223
rows.name:
But it seems like you're always
worrying about the wider world.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0224
rows.name:
Like, people whose names you don't
even know.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0225
rows.name:
It's something I really admire about
you, Zeke. I hope I can learn to care as
much as you do.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0226
rows.name:
Man, you always know what to say.
You're such a...focused guy.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0227
rows.name:
Haha. Gramps said I should pay
more attention to the world
around me, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0228
rows.name: Tell you what then, chum.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0229
rows.name:
While you focus on your main
goals, I'll keep an eye on the
big picture for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0230
rows.name: Yeah. I know I can count on you.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0231
rows.name: Damn right you can!

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0232
rows.name: Oh, what a pair.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0233
rows.name: I find it really inspiring.

rows.label: kizunatalk010_msg0234
rows.name:
Yeah, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a
little inspired.
